p: Compound 343 was evaluted for the cytotoxicities against three human tumor cell lines, including a human breast cancer cell line (MDA-MB-435), a human gastric cancer cell line (SGC-7901), and a human lung adenocarcinoma epithelial cell line (A549) by MTT method. It is notable that penochalasin K 343 exhibited remarkable broad-spectrum inhibitory activities against all the tested cell lines (IC 50 values against MDA-MB-435, SGC-7901 and A549: 4.65 ± 0.45 µM, 5.32 ± 0.58 µM and 8.73 ± 0.62 µM). Epirubicin was used as a positive control with IC 50 values of 0.56 ± 0.06 µM, 0.37 ± 0.11 µM and 0.61 ± 0.05 µM against MDA-MB-435, SGC-7901 and A549 [ 114].
